Create a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0, 0.1303, 0.0] 2. Draw a 2D sketch on face_1 of the coordinate system. 3. Within the sketch, create a circle (circle_1) with the following properties: - Center: [0.1896, 0.1896] - Radius: 0.1896 4. Scale the sketch by a factor of 0.3792. 5. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector defined in the coordinate system. 6. Extrude the 2D sketch along the normal direction by 0.1303 units to create the 3D model of the cylindrical object with a rectangular hole on the top surface. **Part 2: Three-Dimensional Geometric Shape with a Rectangular Base and a Triangular Top** *Shape:* A three-dimensional geometric shape with a rectangular base and a triangular top. The top is offset from the center of the base, creating a sense of balance and stability. The shape is symmetrical along both the horizontal and vertical axes. The edges of the shape are sharp and angular, giving it a modern and sleek appearance. The shape is centered in the image, with equal space on all sides. The overall design is simple yet elegant, with a sense of balance and stability. *Dimensions:* - Height: 0.3175 - Width: 0.3175 - Length: 0.1303 *Instructions:* 1. Create a new coordinate system with the following properties: - Euler Angles: [-90.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.3676, 0.4325, 0.2873] 2. Draw a 2D sketch on face_1 of the coordinate system. 3. Within the sketch, create four lines (line_1, line_2, line_3, line_4) with the following properties: - Line 1: Start Point [0.0, 0.0], End Point [0.3175, 0.0] - Line 2: Start Point [0.3175, 0.0], End Point [0.3175, 0.2871] - Line 3: Start Point [0.3175, 0.2871], End Point [0.0, 0.2871] - Line 4: Start Point [0.0, 0.2871], End Point [0.0, 0.0] 4. Scale the sketch by a factor of 0.3175. 5. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector defined in the coordinate system. 6. Extrude the 2D sketch along the normal direction by 0.1303 units to create the 3D model of the geometric shape with a rectangular base and a triangular top.</description>
